title: Rules to Better ChatGPT and Using the Best API Ever ⭐ + Australia vs England
abstract:
Are you ready to take your GPT game to the next level? Join Adam Cogan and learn invaluable tips and tricks that will help you master the AI revolution.

In this presentation, Adam will show the awesomeness of ChatGPT, including prompt engineering for developers and marketers.

Then Adam will also showcase the wonders of the OpenAI API and demonstrate how developers can leverage it to its full potential. Adam will cover the golden goose of embeddings that provide GPT with context, making it easier to search through documentation and inform ChatGPT responses.

Finally, Adam will also discuss the rise of autonomous agents, which is set to drastically change the software development experience and pave the way to AGI.

Join this talk, to get a solid understanding of how to utilise GPT to its full potential in your company. GPT has a lot to offer – come and enhance your AI skills. This is an exciting time!
eventShortDescription:
August .NET User Group: Rules to Better ChatGPT and Using the Best API Ever ⭐ + Australia vs England

Are you ready to take your GPT game to the next level? Join Adam Cogan and learn invaluable tips and tricks that will help you master the AI revolution.

In this presentation, Adam will show the awesomeness of ChatGPT, including prompt engineering for developers and marketers.

Then Adam will also showcase the wonders of the OpenAI API and demonstrate how developers can leverage it to its full potential. Adam will cover the golden goose of embeddings that provide GPT with context, making it easier to search through documentation and inform ChatGPT responses.

Finally, Adam will also discuss the rise of autonomous agents, which is set to drastically change the software development experience and pave the way to AGI.

Join this talk, to get a solid understanding of how to utilise GPT to its full potential in your company. GPT has a lot to offer – come and enhance your AI skills. This is an exciting time!

Agenda (AEST)

6 pm - Pizza at SSW offices🍕
6:30 pm - Welcome & News with Adam Cogan - this will be live-streamed around the world
7:00 pm - Rules to better ChatGPT and using the best API ever with Adam Cogan (Live from SSW Sydney)

  • OR, join us on the live feed from 6:30 pm!

8:00 pm – Watch party @ SSW offices: Australia vs England | FIFA Women's World Cup 2023™ - Semi-Finals ⚽⭐

--

Join us in person from 6 pm AEST in Sydney, Melbourne, or Brisbane:

SSW Sydney – Live 🔴
SSW Melbourne – Watch party 🎦
SSW Brisbane – Watch party 🎦
